name: Oliver Pendragon and the Creepy Clown Club
name_original: Oliver Pendragon and the Creepy Clown Club
description:
Let's face it: everyone's a little creeped out by clowns. So when the clown uprising began, no one was particularly surprised that they would abduct 11-year-old circus patron Oliver Pendragon to use as a bargaining chip. But Oliver has other plans, and, armed only with rubber balls he finds on the floor, he begins his escape.

This was a solo project, and I did all the art and sound effects myself. I used Amper Music for the music. So far there are only three rooms, but more will be added later.
